articles.author: The Conversation
articles.title: Giant Structure Deep in Australia May Be Largest Asteroid Impact on Record - ScienceAlert
articles.description: In recent research published by myself and my colleague Tony Yeates in the journal Tectonophysics, we investigate what we believe – based on many years of experience in asteroid impact research – is the world's largest known impact structure, buried...
